Model.Entity.Actions

Interface Action

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAction, BadGuyAction, StaticButtonCloseAction, StaticButtonOpenAction, StaticCandyAction, StaticDoorAction

    public interface Action

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actions()
      Method that set the actions to do.
      boolean canBeRedone()
      Tells if the action can be done mutliple times
      boolean isDone()
      Tells if the action has been done yet
      boolean isStartable()
      Method that tells if the action as met the conditions to be started
      void setEntity(StaticEntity e)
      Method that set a specific entity to the action, to make it easier to work
      void start()
      Launch the action when it's called.

    • Method Detail

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Tells if the action has been done yet
        Returns:
        true if the action has been done, false otherwise

      • canBeRedone

        boolean canBeRedone()
        Tells if the action can be done mutliple times
        Returns:
        true if it can be done several times, false otherwise

      • start

        void start()
        Launch the action when it's called.

      • actions

        void actions()
        Method that set the actions to do.

      • isStartable

        boolean isStartable()
        Method that tells if the action as met the conditions to be started
        Returns:
        true if all conditions are met, false otherwise

      • setEntity

        void setEntity(StaticEntity e)
        Method that set a specific entity to the action, to make it easier to work
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to bind to the action
